tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am being treated for the complete mouth reorganise treatment in roots dental care and implant centre Egattur. 
This involves multiple procedures including teeth extractions, RCT tooth shaping crown / bridge fixing. 
The most part are carried under the guidance of Dr Rajith Radhakrishnan and completed. 
Dr Sruti has done wonderful shaping of all the required teeth towards fixing of crowns and bridges. Dr is Very kind caring and carried out like a smooth painting artist. 
Posses great skills and I am very happy and my sincere gratitude to the Dr Sruthi. Thanks a lot Dr doing thankless job
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK.....
replier_name: Rootz Dental Care And Implant Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was very kind enough to explain about my tooth issues.  She took utmost care along with the other doctors to see that my problem gets resolved. My mother who accompanied me was so much relaxed after the doctor's explanation of treatment procedures for root canal.  The experience with Rootz was very much satisfactory and excellent in terms of ambience, hospitality and treatment given.
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Root canal treatment was  perfectly completed by Dr Rajith.  
Directed to Dr Sruthi for taking measurement for temporary tooth.
 Initially i thought it would be easy to take measurement but it took almost 2 hrs to grind and reduce the shape of the teeth so as to get a perfect fitting of temporary tooth. 
Dr Sruthi with great patience did the grinding, confirmed the size reduction of teeth and took measurement precisely. 
Dr explained me regarding the problems and remedies. 
Within two days i got the temporary tooth fitted perfectly without any issues. Thanks to Dr Rajith and Dr Sruthi. I am satisfied with their treatment.
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback sir!!!
